settings.enableLoggingDescription: Record performance data to log files

settings.gpuAccelerationDisabledRestartPrompt: GPU acceleration has been disabled. The application needs to be restarted for the changes to take effect. Restart now?
settings.gpuAccelerationEnabledRestartPrompt: GPU acceleration has been enabled. The application needs to be restarted for the changes to take effect. Restart now?
settings.gpuAccelerationChangedNeedRestart: GPU acceleration settings have been changed. Please restart the application later for the changes to take effect
settings.gpuAccelerationNoChange: GPU acceleration settings have not changed
settings.gpuStatusFetchFailed: Failed to fetch GPU acceleration status
settings.gpuStatusInitFailed: Failed to initialize GPU acceleration status
settings.checkUpdatesDescription: Get the latest features and fixes
settings.updateFailed: Update check failed, please try again later
settings.rateLimitError: Too many requests, please try again in 12 hours
settings.networkError: Network connection failed, please check your connection and try again
settings.resourceNotFound: Update information not found, please try again later
settings.accessDenied: Access denied, please try again later
settings.updateDownloaded: Please download the update from GitHub
settings.updateCheckInterval: Automatically check for updates once per day
settings.updateSourceDescription: Choose where to get app updates from
settings.giteeUpdateHint: Note: Gitee update source may have sync delays. Switch to GitHub source for the latest version
settings.performanceMonitorDescription: Display real-time performance data and charts
settings.developerModeDescription: Enable developer mode to access advanced features
settings.enableLogMenuDescription: Display log menu and logging functionality
settings.parseSavFileDescription: Parse .sav save file to JSON format
settings.packSavFileDescription: Pack JSON file to .sav save format

settings.testArchiveDisplayDescription: Show test archive button in sidebar
settings.seasonalThemeControlDescription: Control seasonal theme visibility (default: only shown during specific dates)
settings.resetTutorialDescription: Reset the quick create tutorial guide, it will show again on next visit
settings.tutorialReset: Tutorial reset, the guide will show next time you visit quick create page

steamApi.title: Steam API
steamApi.apiKeyDescription: Steam Web API key for fetching player username information
steamApi.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the cache entry for user {username}?
steamApi.confirmBatchDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {count} cache entries? This action cannot be undone.
steamApi.keyInvalid: Steam API key is invalid, please check and try again
steamApi.keySaved: Steam API key saved and verified successfully
steamApi.keyTestFailed: API test failed, please check your API key

confirmModal.deleteArchiveMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the archive '{name}'?
confirmModal.deleteArchiveDescription: This action will permanently delete the archive file and cannot be recovered.

createArchive.title: Create New Archive
createArchive.singleplayerNotice: In single player mode, only normal difficulty is available
createArchive.steamIdInfo: This step is optional. You can create an archive without adding Steam IDs.
createArchive.steamIdInvalid: Steam ID can only contain numbers or use offline format(xxxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx)!
createArchive.steamIdDuplicate: Steam ID {steamId} already exists, please do not add it repeatedly!
createArchive.steamIdRequired: Please enter a valid Steam ID
createArchive.steamApiKeyInvalid: Steam API key is invalid or expired. Please update your Steam API key in settings.
createArchive.steamApiRateLimit: Steam API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
createArchive.steamApiKeyNotConfigured: Steam API key not configured. Please add your Steam API key in settings.
createArchive.selectPlayerMessage: Please select a Steam ID player to edit inventory
createArchive.archiveCreatedMessage: Your new archive has been created and is ready to use.
createArchive.archiveNameExists: Archive name already exists, please choose a different name.
createArchive.archiveCreatedError: Archive creation failed, please try again.
createArchive.noPlayersHint: Please add a player Steam ID to manage inventory

editArchive.title: Edit Archive
editArchive.singleplayerNotice: In single player mode, only normal difficulty is available
editArchive.steamIdInfo: This step is optional, you can save an archive without adding Steam ID
editArchive.steamIdInvalid: Steam ID can only contain numbers!
editArchive.steamIdDuplicate: Steam ID {steamId} already exists, please do not add it repeatedly!
editArchive.steamIdRequired: Please enter a valid Steam ID
editArchive.selectPlayerMessage: Please select a Steam ID player to edit inventory
editArchive.noPlayersHint: Please add a player Steam ID to manage inventory
editArchive.jsonSyntaxError: JSON syntax error, please check format
editArchive.selectPlayerHint: Select a player from the left to edit

archiveSearch.title: Search Archives
archiveSearch.noMatchingArchives: No archives match the current criteria
archiveSearch.adjustSearchOrClearFilters: Try adjusting the search or clearing filters
archiveSearch.createNewArchive: Use the "Create Archive" feature to start a new save
archiveSearch.useFiltersAbove: Use the search and filters above

batchCreate.title: Batch Create Archives
batchCreate.subtitle: Create multiple game archives at once

performanceSettings.title: Performance Settings
performanceSettings.enablePerformanceMonitoringDescription: Display real-time performance data and charts
performanceSettings.maxDataPointsDescription: Maximum number of data points to display in the chart
performanceSettings.enableLoggingDescription: Record performance data to log files

createMode.title: Select Create Mode
createMode.subtitle: Choose the archive creation method that suits your needs

classic.title: Classic Mode
classic.desc: Step-by-step configuration for a single archive with full customization options

quick.title: Quick Mode
quick.desc: Quickly create multiple archives with simplified configuration

blueprint.title: Blueprint Mode
blueprint.desc: Wire up any logic you want using a node graph.

inputArea.title: Smart Input
inputArea.emptyHint: Paste archive name list or click buttons above to add
inputArea.supportedFormats: Supports .txt / .csv / .json files, or Ctrl+V to paste
inputArea.sequenceHint: Supports sequence expansion: archive_{'{'} 1-10 {'}'} → generates 10 archives

cardFlow.title: Archive Preview
cardFlow.emptyHint: Archive cards will appear here after adding names
cardFlow.virtualScrollHint: Virtual scrolling enabled for better performance

draft.title: Unsaved Draft Found
draft.message: Found {count} archive(s) from your last session. Would you like to recover?

largeData.title: Large Data Notice
largeData.largeMessage: You have added {count} archives, exceeding the recommended {threshold}. Large numbers of archives may affect interface responsiveness.
largeData.veryLargeMessage: You have added {count} names, exceeding the recommended {threshold}. Consider processing in batches for a better experience.
largeData.tip1: Consider creating in batches, no more than 100 archives per batch
largeData.tip2: Do not close the page during creation to avoid losing progress

batchEdit.title: Batch Edit
batchEdit.hint: Select 'Keep Original' to leave the field unchanged, or select a value to apply to all selected archives

step1.title: Smart Input Area
step1.description: Paste your archive name list here, or import from a file. The system will automatically recognize numbers and keywords in names and highlight them.

step2.title: Uniform Config Area
step2.description: Set uniform level, difficulty, and inventory template. Enable smart rules to automatically assign configurations based on names.

step3.title: Archive Preview Area
step3.description: Preview all archive cards. You can edit, copy, or delete individual cards. Supports batch selection and batch editing.

step4.title: Create Action Area
step4.description: View summary statistics, confirm everything is correct, then click the create button to batch generate archives.

blueprintCreate.title: Blueprint Create
blueprintCreate.subtitle: Wire up logic with nodes and batch-generate archives
blueprintCreate.comingSoonDesc: Blueprint create mode is under development, stay tuned

library.title: Node Library
library.desc: Drag nodes onto the canvas, then connect ports to build your blueprint

properties.title: Node Properties
properties.empty: Select a node to edit its settings
properties.outputHint: Output nodes do not require extra settings

preview.title: Preview
preview.empty: Connect the flow to see a preview here

actions.title: Create
actions.disabledHint: Fix errors or complete the flow first

nodeDesc.nameList: Provide archive names, one per line
nodeDesc.nameSequence: Generate names using a sequence rule
nodeDesc.levelPool: Provide a list of candidate levels
nodeDesc.buildArchives: Combine names and levels into archives
nodeDesc.renameNames: Add a prefix or suffix to names
nodeDesc.setLevel: Apply a single level to all archives

fields.inventoryItemsPlaceholder: One item key or numeric ID per line

errors.multipleOutputs: Only one output node is allowed
errors.missingArchiveInput: Transform node is missing archive input
errors.missingFilterInput: Filter Names node is missing name input
errors.missingBranchInput: Branch node is missing archive input

messages.fixErrors: Please fix errors in the blueprint first
messages.invalidNames: {count} archive names are invalid or contain underscores
messages.templateMissing: Failed to load the base template

theme.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the theme "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
theme.contrastFail: Poor - Does not meet accessibility requirements
theme.sampleText: This is a sample primary text.
theme.sampleSecondaryText: This is a sample secondary text.

feedback.title: User Feedback
feedback.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe your feedback in detail...
feedback.attachmentHint: Images and log files, max 5 files, 25MB each
feedback.dropOrClick: Drop files here or click to upload
feedback.savedOffline: Saved offline, will submit when network is restored
